page.title: 16HORTHAM HOSPITAL.
page.content:
Hortham Hospital is situated in Hortham Lane.It is a hospital for the{mentally handicapped.}There are 378 residents and 350 staff. This includes nurses, secretaries and main_ tenance staff. All but four of the patients have come to the hospital {voluntarily}and there are 15 wards.
The patients have{access}to all the large grounds of the hospital, and can telephone out via a special operator.
On the same site there is a{training {school}for{nurses}for the mentally handicapped.
Hortham will not exist in its present form for much longer. Most patients will be moved into the {community}and the rest will be found places at Brentry Hospital.
